MasterAnswered on 21 Jun 2019Hi anon!Check out our new Seedly article on which credit cards to link to your SimplyGo account here: https://blog.seedly.sg/transitlink-simplygo-promotions/If you're looking into other credit cards instead of the OCBC 365, you should ask yourself what do you prioritize: cashback OR miles? For cashback, i would recommend DBS Live Fresh. For miles, i would recommend Maybank Horizon Visa Signature. Do read the T&Cs still to see if your expenditure behaviour matches the card's features!Hope i helped! Happy traveling :-)0 comments1
